thread.title: Getting player starts for CS cource to work in Hammer.

post.author: hardcore_gamer
post.body:
Ok, i am trying to get into CS mapping. I have created 2 player starts, one func_playerstart_Terrorist and one func_playerstart_Counterterrorist but when i try to run the map, the game/server just says "all teams are full"

????

Why is that?

post.author: ajm113
post.body: You mean by server like local right? Did you also try adding more player starts?

post.author: hardcore_gamer
post.body:
ajm113 wrote:
You mean by server like local right? Did you also try adding more player starts?


Yes, i did. Note that i mean CS source.

Also i am trying to run the map with bots and don't have anybody to try to run the map over LAN.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: honestly, you'd get better answers @ a dedicated valve site then here.

post.author: ajm113
post.body: Yeah, haven't really been playing or modding CSS for a year or so and only been doing it for a couple of months. I can't really help much in this case. So I think your right Happy Friar.
